title: Huawei Watch_When I receive an incoming call, why does the watch display the caller's name for some calls and the caller's number for other calls?
answer: The watch will display the caller's name if the caller has been saved as a contact on your phone and the contact has been synced to your watch. If the caller has not been saved as a contact, the caller's number will be displayed and the number will not be saved to the watch's contacts list.
faqType: SIM Card, SMS, Calls, and Contacts
